title: Riot DEVs are actually not bright
body: Why is it that in ranked I have to lock in my champ EVEN THOUGH I already pre-locked the champ I wanted to play. The whole purpose of prelocking is to show your teammates what you intend to play, SO again, why do I have to physically press "lock-in" if I already pre-locked what I want to play? It's dumb because here I thought the DEVs were actually smart enough to make it show you didn't have to lock it, but nope I accidently dodged the game and now have to wait 30 MINS??? before playing, and why is it now that your queue time increases for every time you dodge, why are you punishing us for dodging?

replies.body: It's an AFK check. You are expected to be present and attentive at all phases of champ select. Next time pay attention.
"why are you punishing us for dodging?" sorry but if you have to ask that question you are in no position to say that other people are "actually not bright"

..User-end problems.

See, players who actually good often **change their pick** instead of playing the same thing regardless of team comp and enemy team comp.
